00021 // A STRUCT USED INTERNALLY FOR INV SLOT REGIONS
00022 typedef struct
00023 {

00029       INT16             sX;                     // starts at 0, gets set via InitInvSlotInterface()
00030       INT16             sY;                     // starts at 0, gets set via InitInvSlotInterface()

00069 // THIS FUNCTION IS CALLED TO RENDER AN ITEM.
00070 // uiBuffer - The Dest Video Surface - can only be FRAME_BUFFER or guiSAVEBUFFER
00071 // pSoldier - used for determining whether burst mode needs display
00072 // pObject  - Usually taken from pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]
00073 // sX, sY, Width, Height,  - Will Center it in the Width
00074 // fDirtyLevel  if == DIRTYLEVEL2 will render everything
00075 //                                        if == DIRTYLEVEL1 will render bullets and status only
00076 // 
00077 //    pubHighlightCounter - if not null, and == 2 - will display name above item
00078 //                                                                -     if == 1 will only dirty the name space and then set counter to 0
00079 //  Last parameter used mainly for when mouse is over item
00080 
00081 void INVRenderItem( UINT32 uiBuffer, SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, OBJECTTYPE  *pObject, INT16 sX, INT16 sY, INT16 sWidth, INT16 sHeight, UINT8 fDirtyLevel, UINT8 *pubHighlightCounter, UINT8 ubStatusIndex, BOOLEAN fOutline, INT16 sOutlineColor );
